forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. Southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the morning awakens with a gentle grace, marked by mostly sunny skies that invite the soft caress of a southwest breeze. As sunlight filters through, illuminating the iconic skyline, the temperature holds a comfortable coolness, whispering of an afternoon that promises a slight descent into the ranges of sixty. The air carries a refreshing clarity, devoid of the dense fog that often blankets the city, though one might sense hints of the marine layer lingering farther west, just beyond the expanse of the Golden Gate.

The day appears poised for pleasant exploration, urging the outdoors enthusiast to take a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a quiet visit to one of the many neighborhood cafés, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with laughter and conversation. As evening approaches, the skies will transition to a clear canvas, the temperature dipping to a cozy fifty, perfect for light layers that embrace the cool air. With this inviting milieu, a simple outing becomes a meditative experience, where the serenity of the sunset over the Bay serves as the perfect backdrop for an evening well spent.
